trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Silver City
There were no other sightings in Silver City on or around December 25th 2012
Summary: Flying disk seen on ground during daylight hours
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving through town and spotted a disk-shaped craft in a person���s front yard. In a brief chat with the pilot, it was discovered that he is not normally seen during daylight hours. However, he had to make a brief layover for some minor repairs. Managed to snap a couple of photos while the craft was grounded, and another during initial lift-off.
